posts.post_title: F/S Raw T206's - Piedmont / Sweet Cap / Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
I have the following cards for sale.  Prices include shipping and insurance.  PayPal (gift) or Money Orders accepted.  Reserve with email.

Thanks!

Kevin

Chappelle - Wrinkle on reverse lower left corner - $25
Doolan (Fielding) - Wear on front - $22
D. Hoffman - Faint lower right corner wrinkle - $25
McElveen - Nice picture but light wrinkle on left side - $25
